title: The Sanctuary of Asklepios at Epidauros
description: A major sanctuary complex, with extensive surviving archaeological remains, located approximately 8km from the ancient city of Epidauros in Greece. A UNESCO World Heritage Site.

properties.description: Greek theater in the Sanctuary of Asklepios at Epidauros, renowned for its acoustics
properties.title: Theater at the Sanctuary of Asklepios, Epidauros
